attributes.action: stop the rot, and fix our country first. Bring the boys back home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
our country has committed itself to "doing the right thing" for nations under pressure, peoples under regime.
This must stop!
Lets stop the rot in our country first.
lets solve our own problems first, like having a very poor NHS, pension chrisis, homelessness, poverty, social acceptance. 
 bring all the boys back home, all of them.
we are fighting on many different fronts, opposing regimes that infringe and take away peoples human rights.
THIS HAPPENS AT HOME.
How many of you are frightened of our own society, the way individuals can keep a community living in fear. And there are many individuals like this, who believe this is ok, and have no regard for the law.
This is widespread and is not just limited to a few communities. 
Lets stop the war here, bring peace back home, and return the idealogy that the law, justice and and  the scales that this great nation was built on, will return.
We cannot go-on trying to fix and help others,(with the media concentrating on Iraq, Afghanistan), when we have so many problems of our own!!
STOP THE ROT, START AT HOME.
